attributes.action: There needs to be a seagull cull in Britain
attributes.additional_details: The seagull menace in Barrow in Furness and the Isle of Walney in Cumbria has become to much for the residents to bear and we request a cull.  We also belive this to be a nationwide problem and belive most costal towns at least would support this cull.  We are sick of the noise pollution, attacks, destruction, etc etc and call on this Government to act
